[Title]: El Viaje de Chihiro
[Year]: 2001
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Runtime]: 125 Min
[Director]: Hayao Miyazaki
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Actors]:
Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Naitô, Yasuko Sawaguchi, Tatsuya Gashûin, Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Yumi Tamai,
Yô Ôizumi, Koba Hayashi, Tsunehiko Kamijô, Takehiko Ono, Bunta Sugawara, Shigeru Wakita, Shirô Saitô
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Plot Summary]:
During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and
spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.::Anonymous
